edu.pitt.utilities

Interface DbUtilities

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySqlUtilities

    public interface DbUtilities
    Provides interface for: 1. Retrieving data sets from MySQL databases. 2. For executing UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE queries 3. For building tables to populate data grids (JTable)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDbConnection()
      Close database connection
      boolean executeQuery(java.lang.String sql)
      Executes INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE queries
      javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel getDataTable(java.lang.String sql)
      Creates a model for JTable using default database table column names as table headers
      javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel getDataTable(java.lang.String sqlQuery, java.lang.String[] customColumnNames)
      Creates a model for JTable using custom column names
      java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet(java.lang.String sql)
      Get SQL result set (data set) based on an SQL query

        boolean executeQuery(java.lang.String sql)
        Executes INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE queries
        Parameters:
        sql - - SQL statement - a well-formed INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query
        Returns:
